name: Avoid Bugs!
description:
A game project I made back then for mobile, updated, and brought over to the web! Avoid Bugs! v1.4

Bugs have started appearing in random places! It's up to the people of the world to avoid them! Keep your finger on the screen and use your dodging skills for a long as possible!

Controls:

Touch and hold the screen or click and hold the left mouse button down and avoid the bugs! 

How long can you last?

________

Gamil Texidor / Studio Tsubaki 2014-2021 

Voice over provided by Raspdere / Shiroppu

https://www.youtube.com/user/raspdere

Music:

"Pinball Spring 160" 

"Overcast"

- Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
